data.title: One Way for Deep Showers
data.description: Use this simple, but effective one way smoke to make it difficult for Attackers to successfully take control of.

data.title: Reclear B Long With Paranoia + Smoke
data.description: Place your smoke at the end of B Long, and flash like so for a strong and simple way to reclear. However, waste no time smoking if you have the timing to throw your flash.

data.title: Standard A Site Delay Dark Covers
data.description: Use these standard Dark Covers to delay enemy players from pushing into A site.

data.title: Hookah to Ramp Paranoia
data.description: A good Paranoia to peek Ramp from Hookah.
